    B

    Battle - Class in game.battle
    This class manages the battle between player and an enemy, manages turns and shows results
    Battle(Player, Enemy) - Constructor for class game.battle.Battle
    Battle class constructor
    BattleCounter - Class in game
    A class that keeps track of the number of battles.
    BattleCounter() - Constructor for class game.BattleCounter
    Constructor for BattleCounter.
    BattlePanel - Class in ui.panels.mainpanels
    Represents the battle panel in the game interface.
    BattlePanel() - Constructor for class ui.panels.mainpanels.BattlePanel
    Creates a new BattlePanel with its components initialized, setting the background image.
    BattleTextArea - Class in ui
    Custom text area used to display battle-related information in the game.
    BattleTextArea() - Constructor for class ui.BattleTextArea
    Constructor that initializes the battle text area and sets its background.
    BOSS - Enum constant in enum class game.characters.EnemyType
    Represents a boss enemy.
    ButtonsAfterLostPanel - Class in ui.panels.otherpanels
    Represents the panel that is displayed after the player loses a battle.
    ButtonsAfterLostPanel() - Constructor for class ui.panels.otherpanels.ButtonsAfterLostPanel
    Creates a new ButtonsAfterLostPanel and initializes it with the buttons for restarting the game and changing class.
    ButtonsAfterWinPanel - Class in ui.panels.otherpanels
    Represents the panel displayed after the player wins a battle.
    ButtonsAfterWinPanel() - Constructor for class ui.panels.otherpanels.ButtonsAfterWinPanel
    Creates a new ButtonsAfterWinPanel and initializes it with buttons to power up player stats and proceed to the next battle.
